thread.section_title: Left Bank Saint Germain - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Will stay here again
thread.title_full: Will stay here again - Review of Left Bank Saint Germain, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: lizzymsh
title: Will stay here again
text:
The location is perfection!
Family of four, and each child had their own bed which was nice. The room was plenty big for all four of us-especially since we were out and about all day, only back to sleep. The bathroom is amazing. Bathtub with shower, another stand alone shower, two sinks. Really beautiful and spacious. Since we were on the ground floor we didn't have a window onto the street. It opened into a small courtyard which was fine and key in a little natural light. Next time maybe we won't bring the kids and get a room on another floor with a street view. ;)
Decor is traditional French. I found it lovely, and just perfect for our purposes. We will be back!
